thread.title: Los Angeles Mayor’s Political Future Tied to Plan to Solve City’s Homeless Crisis

author: Nour Malas
title: Los Angeles Mayor’s Political Future Tied to Plan to Solve City’s Homeless Crisis
text:
LOS ANGELES—Since taking office five years ago, Mayor Eric Garcetti has marketed this city as a model of how an American metropolis can dream big: wooing the 2028 Olympics, courting high-tech companies and pushing for a “subway to the sea.”
But last month, the mayor tied his political future to a goal that has long vexed policy makers here: housing the city’s homeless, which he publicly declared his “No. 1 issue.” Homelessness has exploded during his tenure, leaving Los Angeles with a fast growing population of people living...
